name: Color Trouble (itch)
description:
Start playing Color Trouble today – a strategy game loved by many around the world.

Slide and match Color in this challenging adventure to progress to the next level and stay on top in the leaderboard ! Many say it is hard to achieve a perfect score of 100 , we say take the challenge up. Match and get score above 90 to move to next level and be rewarded with color currencies which can help you to get easy hints.

Color trouble is also available to play in guest mode

Website - https://color-trouble.systangostudios.com/
Download on App Store (iOS Users) - https://apps.apple.com/us/app/color-trouble/id1490246876?ls=1
Download on Google Play store (Android Users) - https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=com.systango.ios.gradient
Play Progressive Web App - https://color-trouble-pwa.systangostudios.com/

Developed and Maintained by Systango
